channel.title: How can i make that npc's drop on bulby's 508

item.title: How can i make that npc's drop on bulby's 508
item.dc:creator: @dsv.13 dsv.13
item.description:
@dsv.13 wrote:

hi, how can i make that npc’s drops items??

got already this in npcdrops.cfg

2745=,6570:1; 6260=,0995:100; 5996=,0995:20; 2745=,0995:400; 5920=,0391:2; 0021=,0554:70; 0021=,0556:50; 0021=,0565:10;

i compiled it but the npc’s dont drop anything?

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make that npc's drop on bulby's 508
